results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n, m) = min(2*m - 1, 2*(n - m) + 1).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
formula: T(n,m) = T(n,n-m) = 2*m-1 for 0 <= m <= n/2, otherwise 2*(n-m)+1.
a(n) = t - abs(t^2-2n+1), where t = floor(sqrt(2n)+1/2). (End)
